summary: A video guide by Adanna, a young Physician Assistant (PA), aimed at helping viewers prepare for the GRE exam, understand its importance for PA school admissions, and navigate the entire process efficiently while managing costs.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark couch and patterned cushions in the background. She speaks directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The scene transitions to a graphic of a rotating globe with black and turquoise stripes, followed by a logo with a silhouette of a person with a stethoscope and the text "Adanna The PA." The video returns to the woman, who continues to speak and gesture. Text appears at the bottom of the screen, stating, "All the views expressed in my videos are my own personal opinions and based on my experiences as a PA-Student. For more info on being a Physician Assistant visit: www.AAPA.org." The video maintains a consistent setting and atmosphere throughout, focusing on the woman's presentation and the informational content.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker advising listeners to ensure they know exactly when they want to take something and have the time. This is followed by upbeat, funky music. A female speaker then introduces herself and thanks viewers for subscribing to her channel, encouraging them to subscribe.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark couch and patterned cushions in the background. She speaks directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. Throughout the video, she maintains a friendly and engaging demeanor. Text overlays appear on the screen, including a disclaimer at the bottom stating, "All the views expressed in my videos are my own personal opinions and based on my experiences as a PA-Student. For more info on being a Physician Assistant visit: www.AAPA.org." Additionally, a pink graphic with the word "Subscribe" appears, encouraging viewers to subscribe to her channel. Towards the end, a text overlay suggests watching another video titled "Navigating the GRE website," with a link provided in the description. The video maintains a consistent setting and atmosphere, focusing on the woman's presentation and the informative content she delivers.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features one speaker, a female with an enthusiastic tone, discussing the GRE. She explains the purpose of the video: to share information learned from her own experience. She defines the GRE and discusses its requirement for graduate and PA schools, as well as alternatives like the MCAT for some PA schools. She concludes by advising listeners to tailor their applications based on the schools they're applying to and whether or not they require the GRE, suggesting taking the GRE for broader options.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman with braided hair and wearing a red top is seated in a living room, speaking directly to the camera. The background features a dark-colored couch with patterned cushions and framed pictures on the wall. Throughout the video, she uses hand gestures to emphasize her points, occasionally raising her hands with palms facing up or pointing with her fingers. At one point, text appears on the screen reading "ETS.org/GRE," which is a website related to the Graduate Record Examinations (GRE) test. The woman's facial expressions and body language suggest she is engaged in a conversation or presentation, likely discussing topics related to the GRE. The setting remains consistent, with no significant changes in the environment or lighting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker with an informative tone, introducing a website. She states that she will be "going on to the website" to "show you where I found most of the information". She mentions the website "ets.org" for GRE registration, scheduling, test center selection, and "other cool things". Her tone is enthusiastic as she speaks of a video on the actual website.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark-colored couch and patterned cushions in the background. She appears to be speaking directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The room is decorated with framed pictures on the wall, creating a cozy and personal atmosphere. Throughout the video, the woman's facial expressions and gestures change as she continues her conversation, maintaining a consistent setting and focus on her.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a single female speaker. She begins by responding to a question about when to take the GRE, answering, "Take the GRE when you're ready." She describes a month-long study plan, mentioning that she studied a lot. She explains that she visited a library and asked for GRE books, which she checked out for the month and renewed as needed. Her tone is enthusiastic and conversational.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark brown couch and patterned cushions in the background. She appears to be speaking, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The scene transitions to a man in a green patterned shirt standing with his hands on his hips in a dimly lit room with brick walls and framed pictures. The video then returns to the woman in the living room, continuing her speech with expressive hand movements. The setting remains consistent throughout, with the woman's gestures and expressions indicating an engaging conversation or presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a solo female speaker. She explains her study methods, which involved using flashcards and continuous repetition for the verbal reasoning section. She mentioned knowing root words and understanding how to break down words and their meanings, comparing the process to medical terminology. The speaker then brags, mentioning the word "loquacious," and is promptly interrupted by male speaker exclaiming, "What the hell is that!?" She returns, explaining that she took practice tests repeatedly for the quantitative section, ending the audio clip.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark brown couch and patterned cushions in the background. She appears to be speaking directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The room is decorated with black and white framed pictures on the wall. Throughout the video, the woman maintains a consistent posture and expression, indicating a focused and engaging presentation. Towards the end, text appears on the screen that reads "SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE WEEKLY PA RELATED VIDEOS," encouraging viewers to subscribe for more content related to the topic being discussed. The overall atmosphere is casual and informative, with the woman's expressions and gestures adding emphasis to her message.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a person speaking about the GRE test. She mentions services like "Magush" and "Manhattan" for GRE prep, adding that "Magush is $129 for a one time thing". The speaker advises to "go there and pay the money you want" or go to the library and "study your behind off and kill the GRE". During her speech, a loud and prolonged rattling sound is heard in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with dark skin and braided hair, wearing a red top, seated in a living room. She is positioned in front of a dark brown couch adorned with two gray pillows featuring a geometric pattern. The background includes a white wall with two black and white photographs. Throughout the video, the woman appears to be speaking, as indicated by her mouth movements and hand gestures. Her facial expressions and hand movements suggest she is engaged in a conversation or delivering a message. The setting remains consistent, with no significant changes in the environment or background details. The lighting is soft and even, creating a calm and focused atmosphere. The woman's attire and hairstyle remain unchanged throughout the video, maintaining a cohesive visual presentation.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a female speaker discussing the GRE exam, mentioning "scores back" and "what next" with a slightly enthusiastic tone. She highlights the benefits of receiving immediate scores and planning accordingly, such as retaking the exam, and states that the GRE can be taken "every 21 days." She talks about maximizing the score and planning for taking the exam again. The clip ends with the female speaker mentioning that improving the score requires "time and money."

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with dark skin and braided hair, wearing a red top, seated in a living room. She is positioned in front of a dark brown couch adorned with two gray pillows featuring a geometric pattern. The background includes a white wall with two black and white photographs hanging on it. Throughout the video, the woman appears to be speaking, as indicated by her mouth movements and hand gestures. Her facial expressions change slightly, suggesting she is engaged in a conversation or delivering a message. The lighting in the room is soft, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The camera remains stationary, focusing on the woman and capturing her expressions and gestures clearly.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a female speaker advising strategic planning because you "may not have the time" or money, and that you don't want to be "wasting time or money," as these resources are hard to recover. Her tone is measured and instructive.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a woman with braided hair and wearing a red top is seated in a living room, speaking directly to the camera. The background features a dark brown couch adorned with two patterned pillows and two black-and-white photographs on the wall. Throughout the video, the woman uses hand gestures to emphasize her points, occasionally raising her hands to her chest or pointing with her fingers. Her facial expressions change as she speaks, indicating a range of emotions and emphasis on her words. events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a single speaker discussing the cost of the GRE, mentioning it is $205 with additional fees for rescheduling or late registration, noting "if you are late, if you are changing." The speaker has a conversational tone, emphasizing making decisions ahead of time to avoid extra costs. The recording ends with this speech.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair, wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark-colored couch and patterned cushions in the background. She appears to be speaking directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The room is decorated with framed pictures on the wall, creating a cozy and personal atmosphere. events_list.audio_caption: The clip features a single female speaker giving advice about applying to schools with Casper, including sending GRE scores. She talks in a friendly and informative tone. She mentions, "you put in your GRE score yourself", and the importance of having the school's number ready when sending scores.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman with braided hair wearing a red top, seated in a living room with a dark couch and patterned cushions in the background. She speaks directly to the camera, using hand gestures to emphasize her points. The setting is casual and homey, with framed pictures on the wall behind her. At one point, a text overlay appears, directing viewers to watch another video titled 'Navigating the GRE website,' with a link provided in the description. The woman continues her discussion, occasionally pointing to the screen displaying the GRE website interface. Social media icons for Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook appear, along with her handle '@ADANNATHEPA.' The video maintains a consistent atmosphere, focusing on the woman's engaging presentation and the informative content she provides.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single female speaker providing advice related to the GRE test and associated costs, highlighting the importance of efficiency. Her tone is friendly and informative, sharing personal tips. The recording then transitions to the speaker announcing a change in topic to navigating a website, preparing to show the audience how to log in and choose test centers. The recording ends with her stating they are starting “right now”.
